newsitem.title: CANADA: Bre-X shares plunge at the open.
newsitem.headline: Bre-X shares plunge at the open.

text.p: Bre-X Minerals Ltd shares plunged 3.17 at the open on Tuesday to 0.06 in blistering turnover of 6.02 million shares on the Toronto Stock Exchange within the first few minutes of trading.

The stock -- at its height worth 28.65 a share after being split 10-for-one -- recovered slightly soon afterward, trading down 3.13 at 0.10 with 14 million shares traded after the market was open for just nine minutes.
Bre-X tumbled 2-11/32 to 1/32 in light trading on Nasdaq.
Bre-X's Busang discovery deep in the jungles of Borneo was touted by the Calgary, Alberta-based company as the richest find of the century.
But a report from independent consultant Strathcona Mineral Services Ltd. late Sunday revealed that samples from the property were falsified on a scale "without precedent in the history of mining."
Bresea Resources Ltd shares, a Bre-X affiliate, tumbled 1.29 to 0.16 on the Montreal Exchange while another unit, Bro-X Minerals Ltd was halted on the Alberta Stock Exchange.
Minorca Resources Inc shares fell 1.18 to 0.76 in trade of 1.21 million shares.
